BG3 Warlock Tips & Builds

NEW SUBCLASS, Hexblade, will be added in Patch 8. You can check out our Warlock Guide here. Opt for The Fiend for offensive spells and a health-restoring feature upon defeating enemies, aiding in your character's survival. Cast Hex for extra damage and recast it after killing an enemy to maintain sustained bonus damage without cons
